profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.subtitle: Manage your personal information and preferences
profile.displayNameHint: This is how your name will appear throughout the app
profile.displayNamePlaceholder: How you want to be addressed
profile.languageHint: Choose your preferred language for the interface
profile.bioPlaceholder: Tell us a little about yourself...
profile.loadError: Failed to load profile. Please try again.

visibility.label: Profile Visibility
visibility.hint: Public profiles can be discovered by other users. Private profiles are only visible to you.

avatar.errorInvalidType: Please select a JPEG, PNG, or WebP image

civic.title: Civic Information
civic.description: This information helps us provide more relevant civic engagement recommendations and ballot information tailored to your interests.

demographic.title: Demographic Information
demographic.description: This information helps us better understand how policies and ballot measures may affect you personally. All information is kept private and secure.

addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.subtitle: Manage your addresses for civic and mailing purposes
addresses.noAddressesHint: Add an address to get started
addresses.label: Label (Optional)
addresses.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this address?
addresses.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

notifications.title: Notification Preferences
notifications.subtitle: Choose how and when you want to be notified
notifications.unsubscribeConfirm: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from all notifications?
notifications.loadError: Failed to load preferences. Please try again.

privacy.title: Privacy & Consent
privacy.subtitle: Manage your privacy settings and data consent preferences
privacy.loadError: Failed to load consent preferences. Please try again.
privacy.rightsDescription: Under GDPR and CCPA, you have the right to control how your personal data is collected and used. You can withdraw consent at any time for non-essential data processing. Required consents are necessary for the basic operation of our services.

legal.title: Legal Agreements
legal.description: Required agreements for using our services

marketing.title: Marketing Communications
marketing.description: Choose how you'd like to receive marketing content

data.title: Data & Analytics
data.description: Control how your data is used to improve our services

civic.title: Civic Engagement
civic.description: Permissions related to civic features and voter information

terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.description: Agreement to our terms and conditions for using the platform

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description: Acknowledgment of how we collect, use, and protect your data

marketing_email.title: Email Marketing
marketing_email.description: Receive promotional emails, newsletters, and special offers

marketing_sms.title: SMS Marketing
marketing_sms.description: Receive promotional text messages and alerts

marketing_push.title: Push Notifications
marketing_push.description: Receive promotional push notifications on your devices

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Allow us to collect usage data to improve our platform

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: Enable personalized content and recommendations based on your activity

data_sharing.title: Data Sharing
data_sharing.description: Allow sharing anonymized data with trusted partners for research

location_tracking.title: Location Tracking
location_tracking.description: Allow location data collection for location-based features

voter_data_collection.title: Voter Data Collection
voter_data_collection.description: Allow collection of voting-related data to provide civic information

civic_notifications.title: Civic Notifications
civic_notifications.description: Receive notifications about elections, deadlines, and civic updates

representative_contact.title: Representative Contact
representative_contact.description: Allow us to facilitate contact with your elected representatives

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.exportDesc: Download a copy of all your personal data in JSON format
dataManagement.deleteDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

security.title: Security
security.subtitle: Manage your passkeys and active sessions

passkeys.title: Passkeys
passkeys.description: Secure, passwordless login using biometrics or security keys
passkeys.addDescription: Register a new passkey using your device's biometrics or security key. This will enable faster, more secure sign-in.
passkeys.emptyHint: Add a passkey for faster, more secure sign-in
passkeys.friendlyNameHint: Give your passkey a name to help identify it later
passkeys.notSupported: Your browser doesn't support passkeys. Please use a modern browser like Chrome, Safari, or Edge.
passkeys.benefit1: Phishing-resistant - cannot be stolen or guessed
passkeys.benefit3: Use Face ID, Touch ID, or security keys
passkeys.registrationPending: Passkey registration will be available once the backend implementation is complete.

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.description: Devices currently signed in to your account
sessions.signOutConfirm: Are you sure you want to sign out of this device?
sessions.signOutAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to sign out of all devices? You will need to sign in again.
sessions.otherSessionsNote: To manage sessions on other devices, sign out here and change your password. This will require all devices to sign in again.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account

authenticator.title: Authenticator App
authenticator.description: Use an app like Google Authenticator or Authy

recovery.title: Recovery Codes
recovery.description: Backup codes for when you cannot access your authenticator

password.title: Password
password.description: Legacy password authentication (optional when using passkeys)
password.changeDescription: Update your password if you still use password-based login

activity.title: Activity Log
activity.subtitle: View your account activity and manage active sessions
activity.loadError: Failed to load activity. Please try again.

sessions.revokeAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke all other sessions? You will need to sign in again on those devices.
